title: Fender Benders
description: Rubbing is racing. The DTM in the 90s was the most competitive touring car series on earth. BMW vs Mercedes at the Nurburgring.

keyMoments: The rivalry between the M3 Sport Evo and the 190E Evo II
Cecotto and Winkelhock fighting for every inch
Curbs being used as launch ramps
raceContext.significance: Group A cars were based on road cars but highly tuned. They required an aggressive driving style and delivered some of the best door-to-door racing in history.

ams2.vehicleName: BMW M3 Sport Evo Group A
